issue.title: [Python] Document parquet.FileMetadata and statistics
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16114](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16114). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`FileMetaData` in parquet module (returned by `ParquetFile.metadata`) isn't in the API docs. We should add to the API docs so users can know what fields are available.
